The graph below contains the rectangle $ABC$ and the point $P$.  
  
**Draw the image of $ABC$ under a dilation whose center is $P$ and scale factor is $\dfrac{1}{4}$.**  
  
[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
  
**Which of the following statements about the image of triangle $ABC$ are true?**  

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: The image of $\angle B$ is $27^\circ$. *(Suppose angle B labeled $108^\circ$)*
The line that passes through the image of side $\overline{BC}$ is the same line that passes through side $\overline{BC}$.
The line that passes through the image of side $\overline{AC}$ is parallel to the line that passes through side $\overline{AC}$.
The image of $\angle C$ is congruent to $\angle C$.
$\angle A$ is congruent to its image.
$\angle C$ is $4$ times larger than its image.
The image of $\angle A$ is $\dfrac{1}{4}$ the size of $\angle A$.
